_header: Jesu of His mother was born
_description: ‘Verbum caro factum est’ — six quatrains (aaab) with ‘He tok his deth for most & lest’ refrain and burden: ‘I may seyn to most & lest / Verbum caro factum est’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Jhesu of his moder was bornFor vs he werde garlond of
                    thorn…
BLSl2593.Last Lines: …At domysday our helpe he beHe tok &c.
